main.name: Mathijs Hubrechtsen
main.description: An ambitious DIY tinkerer with an entrepreneurial spirit
main.bio: I am a passionate computer science student with aspirations to build my own business some day. To me, technology can be used to create a better tomorrow and I want to show people exactly how. I want to make people believe again, to inspire them to believe that contrary to popular belief, a better tomorrow IS possible. My fields of interest include embedded devices, IoT, and cyber security and how these technologies can be used to improve people's lives.
main.contactmessage: Want to get in touch with me? (Contact Form WIP)

education.degree: Bachelor of Science - BS, Computer Science, Cum Laude
education.description: Minor in Business Economics. Also known as “Bachelor in de Informatica”. During this time I also volunteered as a PAL Tutor.

work.title: Software Security Research Assistant (Student)
work.description: Worked on various Penetration Testing assignments in Embedded Systems. These included investigating the applications of Software Fuzzing in Automotive Systems, expanding KULeuven's Vehicular Software Security Research in general and explore Security solutions for Experimental V2X systems.

work.title: CleanTech Board Member
work.description: Responsible for organizing the CleanTech challenge entrepreneurship competition in Leuven.

work.title: Software Developer (Student)
work.description: Worked on building a Python Django Back-End for a new Soundtalks product's Web Application.

resume.skillmessage: Due to my curiosity and passion for computer science, I have developed quite a few technical skills. However, I also posses some useful soft skills such as public speaking.

projects.title: Zoo Network
projects.category: A DIY home lab and computer network, originally built by recycling old computer equipment.

projects.title: G.I.N.G.E.R.
projects.category: G.I.N.G.E.R. is a polymorphic Node.js IoT framework, it's intended as both a rapid prototyping framework as well as a framework that can be used in Home Automation contexts.

projects.title: Caring Caribou
projects.category: A friendly car security exploration tool

projects.title: Publication
projects.category: Co-authored academic publication on software fuzzing in automotive systems.

projects.title: Stream
projects.category: I stream in Science & Technology on twitch.

projects.title: CSx2
projects.category: A way to parse the html calendar of KUL Computer Science to ical format so that it can be added to external calendar applications.

projects.title: ID3-Automator
projects.category: Program that automatically adds meta data to mp3 files in the current directory given a wikipedia album link.

projects.title: DRAMA Stapel Tekenaar
